Detailed Description
Cassini1 class that represents a specific astronomical function configuration.
This class initializes and configures a function used for astronomical computations. Inherits from the Astrofun class and sets specific parameters required for the Cassini1 configuration.
x_params (list of float): A list representing parameters on the x-axis. y_params (list of float): A list representing parameters on the y-axis.
